channel.title: Make it so you cant tele
channel.description: I have it when you die, you go to a certain place. You kill a monster for a key then leave through a portal. I want it so you cant tele out. How do i make it so you cant tele out?

item.title: Make it so you cant tele
item.dc:creator: @Scarr Scarr
item.description:
@Scarr wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:5, topic:199038”]ya, prbably something like

if(playerIsInArea(TopLeftX, TopLeftY, BottomRightX, BotomRightY) { teleblock = true; } [/quote]

Lol, I’m sure that’s basically it. But you search like nonwild or something along those lines.

Read full topic
item.source: Make it so you cant tele

item.title: Make it so you cant tele
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

ya, prbably something like

if(playerIsInArea(TopLeftX, TopLeftY, BottomRightX, BotomRightY)
{
teleblock = true;
}

Read full topic
item.source: Make it so you cant tele

item.title: Make it so you cant tele
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Jp Owner Jp
item.description:
@Owner_Jp wrote:

There’s a code that makes it so that in certain areas you’re teleblocked, look in tuts. Usually People post about in with jail commands.

Read full topic

item.source: Make it so you cant tele

item.title: Make it so you cant tele
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

look in your client.java for something like teleblock = true; and then in your code put it in there. so after the teleportToX, and Y, put

teleblock = true;

Read full topic
